alert.note: Alert for Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 5:23AM MDT until April 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Glasgow MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Montana... Beaver Creek near Hinsdale affecting Valley County. For the Beaver Creek...including Hinsdale...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Beaver Creek near Hinsdale. * WHEN...From early this morning to Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM MDT Monday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:30 AM MDT Monday was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.3 feet on 05/12/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 530 PM MDT.
